pt.com.gmv.lab.implant.interfaces.rendering.poi
Interface POIModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimplePOI
public interface POIModel

A POIModel represents a POI on the screen. It has a POI associated that has all the information related to the physical place.

Since:
2
Author:
fao

Method Summary
 void draw(Canvas canvas, Paint paint)
          Draw the POIModel on screen
 POI getPOIInfo()
          Returns the POI object that contains all relevant information about the point of interest.
 WorldVector getPOILocation()
          Returns the POI location on the world.
 WorldVector getScreenLocation()
          Returns a vector with the POIModel location on screen.
 boolean isAtCenter()
          If the POIModel is in a small strip at the center of the screen
 boolean isClickValid(float x, float y)
          Reports if a click is valid for a given POIModel
 boolean isVisible()
          If the POIModel is visible on screen.
 boolean onClick(Context context, MotionEvent me)
          What should happen when a click on a POIModel on the screen.
 void performWorldTransformations(ProjectionCamera mCamera)
          Performs the necessary transformations to the POIModel according to the last known location of the device.
 void update(Location current)
          Updates the POIModel location values based on the device current location.
 

Method Detail

getScreenLocation

WorldVector getScreenLocation()
Returns a vector with the POIModel location on screen.

Returns:
A vector containing the screen location

getPOILocation

WorldVector getPOILocation()
Returns the POI location on the world. It's not equal to the GPS location of the point, since these values represent a distance to the actual device location.

Returns:
A vector containing the world location of the POI to the device.

getPOIInfo

POI getPOIInfo()
Returns the POI object that contains all relevant information about the point of interest.

Returns:
The associated POI object.

isVisible

boolean isVisible()
If the POIModel is visible on screen.

Returns:
True if the POIModel is visible on screen

isAtCenter

boolean isAtCenter()
If the POIModel is in a small strip at the center of the screen

Returns:
True if the POIModel is in that small strip.

draw

void draw(Canvas canvas,
          Paint paint)
Draw the POIModel on screen

Parameters:
canvas - The canvas where to draw
paint - The Paint object to use in the drawing routine

update

void update(Location current)
Updates the POIModel location values based on the device current location.

Parameters:
current - The Location object containing the device coordinates.

performWorldTransformations

void performWorldTransformations(ProjectionCamera mCamera)
Performs the necessary transformations to the POIModel according to the last known location of the device. Should affect the World and Screen location of the POIModel.

Parameters:
mCamera - The camera used to help apply the transformations

onClick

boolean onClick(Context context,
                MotionEvent me)
What should happen when a click on a POIModel on the screen.

Parameters:
context - The application context
me - The MotionEvent object of the click
Returns:
True in case the click is considered valid

isClickValid

boolean isClickValid(float x,
                     float y)
Reports if a click is valid for a given POIModel

Parameters:
x - The click x coordinate
y - The clock y coordinate
Returns:
True if the click is valid.
